        @POST
 @Path(value="/{id}/orders")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createOrder(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                  int id,
                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="tamtam")
                                                                                  int[] tamtams,
                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="shipment")
                                                                                  int idShipment,
                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="decoration")
                                                                                  int[] decorations)
        (POST /{id}/orders) Create a new order
        Parameters:
        id - int (QUERY) id of the customer who ordered
        tamtams - int[] (QUERY) ids of the tamtams in correlation with the decorations
        idShipment - int (QUERY) id of the selected shipment
        decorations - int[] (QUERY) ids of the decoration in corelation with the tamtams
        Returns:
        Response
